sen.j: 西園寺 公遂（さいおんじ きんすい、寛文3年2月23日 (旧暦)（1663年4月1日） - 延宝6年6月10日 (旧暦)（1678年7月28日））は、江戸時代前期の公卿。
sen.e: Kinsui SAIONJI (April 1, 1663 - July 28, 1687) was Kugyo (court noble) in the early Edo period.
Kinsui SAIONJI (April 1, 1663 - July 28, 1687) was Kugyo (a Court Noble) in the early Edo period.
sen.cmt: court noble→a Court Nobleに訂正しました。
sen.e: Kinsui SAIONJI (April 1, 1663 - July 28, 1687) was Kugyo (a Court Noble) in the early Edo period.

sen.j: 主に霊元天皇（112代）の代の朝廷に仕え、官位は従三位近衛府まで昇った。
sen.e: He mostly served the Imperial Court in the reign of Emperor Reigen (112th), and was promoted to Jusanmi Knoefu (Junior Third Rank, the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).
He primarily served for the sovereign of the 112th Emperor Reigen in the Imperial Court; He was promoted up to "Jusanmi Knoefu" (Junior Third Rank and the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).
sen.cmt: mostly→primarily, served the Imperial Court at the reign of → for the sovereign of the 112thに訂正しました。upを追加しました。役職に""をつけました。Andを追加しました。
sen.e: He primarily served for the sovereign of the 112th Emperor Reigen in the Imperial Court; He was promoted up to "Jusanmi Knoefu" (Junior Third Rank and the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards).

sen.j: 父は左大臣西園寺実晴。
sen.e: His father was Sadaijin (minister of the left) Saneharu SAIONJI.
His father was Sadaijin (Minister of the Left) Saneharu SAIONJI.
sen.cmt: 役職の単語の頭文字を大文字にしました。
sen.e: His father was Sadaijin (Minister of the Left) Saneharu SAIONJI.
His mother was unknown.
His mother was unknown.
His mother was unknown.

sen.j: 実晴の子である西園寺公満と西園寺公宣、公満の子である西園寺実尚が早世や若くして辞職した
sen.e: Since Saneharu's sons, Kinmitsu SAIONJI and Kinnobu SAIONJI, and Kinmitsu's son, Sanenao SAIONJI, died or resigned their posts at an early age, he succeeded to the Saionji family.

In terms of Kinsui's relatives, such as Kinmitsu SAIONJI and Kinnobu SAIONJI who were the sons of Saneharu, and Sanenao SAIONJI who was the son of Kinmitsu, some died young and some resigned the positions in their early career.
sen.cmt: 文法を整理し、全体的に訂正しました。一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: In terms of Kinsui's relatives, such as Kinmitsu SAIONJI and Kinnobu SAIONJI who were the sons of Saneharu, and Sanenao SAIONJI who was the son of Kinmitsu, some died young and some resigned the positions in their early career.

sen.j: そのために、彼が西園寺家の家督を継ぐこととなった。
sen.e: As a result, Kinsui SAIONJI became heir to the Saionji family.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理
sen.e: As a result, Kinsui SAIONJI became heir to the Saionji family.
In 1671, he was conferred a peerage.
In 1671, he was conferred a peerage.
In 1671, he was conferred a peerage.

sen.j: 以降累進して延宝5年（1677年）に従三位となり公卿に列したが、この翌年に薨去している。
sen.e: After that, he was promoted from one position to another and became Jusami (Junior Third Rank) in 1677 and was ranked with Kugyo, however, he died next year.
Since then, he was successfully promoted by taking different positions; He became Jusami (Junior Third Rank) in 1677, which gave him the title Kugyo; Nevertheless, he died the next year.
sen.cmt: After that→Since thenに訂正しました。successfullyを追加しました。by taking different positions→from one position to anotherに訂正しました。was ranked with→which gave him the titleに訂正しました。However→Neverthelessに訂正しました。Next yearにtheを追加しました。
sen.e: Since then, he was successfully promoted by taking different positions; He became Jusami (Junior Third Rank) in 1677, which gave him the title Kugyo; Nevertheless, he died the next year.
He was only sixteen years old.
He died at the age of only sixteen.
sen.cmt: He was→He died at the age ofに訂正しました。years old削除しました。
sen.e: He died at the age of only sixteen.

sen.j: 西園寺家には相続人がいなくなったので、やむなく関白鷹司房輔の次男の西園寺実輔を養子縁組に迎えて西園寺家を相続させることとなった。
sen.e: Since there was no successor left in the Saionji Family, they necessarily adopted Sanesuke SAIONJI, a second son of Kanpaku (chief adviser to the Emperor) Fusasuke TAKATSUKASA and made him to succeed to the Saionji Family.

Because there was no eligible successor in the Saionji family, they reluctantly adopted Sanesuke SAIONJI who was the second son of Kanpaku (Chief Adviser to the Emperor) Fusasuke TAKATSUKASA; Consequently Sanetsune became heir to the Saionji Family.
sen.cmt: since→because, no successor left→no eligible successor, necessarily→reluctantlyに訂正しました。Who was, Consequentlyを追加しました。 made him to succeed to→became heir toに訂正しました。
sen.e: Because there was no eligible successor in the Saionji family, they reluctantly adopted Sanesuke SAIONJI who was the second son of Kanpaku (Chief Adviser to the Emperor) Fusasuke TAKATSUKASA; Consequently Sanetsune became heir to the Saionji Family.

sen.j: ちなみにこの実輔も早世する。
sen.e: Incidentally, Sanesuke also died at an early age.
Incidentally, Sanesuke also died young.
sen.cmt: at an early age→youngに訂正しました。
sen.e: Incidentally, Sanesuke also died young.
